p: Another recent report, by a different group of researchers, also supported the use of remdesivir against coronaviruses. This group showed that remdesivir inhibited virus infection efficiently in a human cell line sensitive to SARS-CoV‑2 [ 6]. The same authors tested chloroquine and concluded “remdesivir and chloroquine are highly effective in the control of COVID-19 infection in vitro.” They further suggested both should be assessed in human patients with COVID-19 [ 6].
